about_the_game: "Infernal Rot" - is a thorough digital lore book that goes into the intricate plot and character motivations of "Left to Rot." This substantial resource provides insights into Kate's experience while also providing light on Luca and the other victims in the story. "Infernal Rot" is intended for those who want to better understand the game's universe. It delves into the concepts and creative elements that define the world and its intricacies.
detailed_description: "Infernal Rot" - is a thorough digital lore book that goes into the intricate plot and character motivations of "Left to Rot." This substantial resource provides insights into Kate's experience while also providing light on Luca and the other victims in the story. "Infernal Rot" is intended for those who want to better understand the game's universe. It delves into the concepts and creative elements that define the world and its intricacies.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955 equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB, or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or AMD Ryzen 5 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, AMD Radeon RX 5700, or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or AMD Phenom II X4 955 equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB, or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or AMD Ryzen 5 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, AMD Radeon RX 5700, or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL Version 4.0 or higher, Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.

short_description: "Infernal Rot" - is a digital lore book that delves deep into the plot, and character motives, of "Left to Rot," providing a complete knowledge of the game's universe and complexity.
